text: Late Flowers () is a 1970 Soviet drama movie directed by Abram Room.Февральская программа Музея кино к Году литературыЦВЕТЫ ЗАПОЗДАЛЫЕ (1969) It stars Irina Lavrenteva, Alexander Lazarev, and Olga Zhiznyeva. == Actors == *Irina Lavrenteva as Maroussia, Princess Priklonskaya * Alexander Lazarev as Dr. Nikolai Semenovich Toporkov * Olga Zhiznyeva as Princess Priklonskaya * Valery Zolotukhin as Yegorushka * Inna Ulyanova as Kaleria Ivanovna *Alexander Khanov as Nikifor, valet == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1970 drama movies Category:Movies directed by Abram Room Category:Russian drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Late Flowers
